definition: the act of physically reaching or thrusting out, be in or establish communication with
details:
noun
- the act of physically reaching or thrusting out
= synonyms: reaching
- an area in which something acts or operates or has power or control: 'the range of a supersonic jet'
= synonyms: compass, scope, range, orbit, ambit
- the limit of capability
= synonyms: grasp, compass, range
- the limits within which something can be effective
= synonyms: range
verb
- be in or establish communication with
= example: be in or establish communication with
= synonyms: contact
- to exert much effort or energy
= synonyms: strain, strive
- move forward or upward in order to touch
= synonyms: reach out
- reach a point in time, or a certain state or level
= synonyms: attain, hit
- reach a destination, either real or abstract
= synonyms: hit
- reach a goal, e.g., 'make the first team'
= synonyms: make
- place into the hands or custody of
= synonyms: pass
- to gain with effort
= synonyms: accomplish, attain, achieve
- to extend as far as
= example: to extend as far as
= synonyms: touch
